node.excerpt: Where does Gatsby get configured? Everything that makes your Gatsby setup unique will pass through  gatsby-config.js . As long as it's placed at the root of your project, it will be picked up automatically. What goes in this file? How do I use a starter? When starting a project, the CLI takes a…

What is a starter? A starter is exactly as it sounds - a starting point to build your next Gatsby project. They contain all the logic you need to get up and running in a few commons scenarios. While the more common ones are set up by Gatsby themselves, anybody can make a starter. All that is…
